name: The_Othersid‪e‬
description:
A single-player retro style board game comes to life where players must scavenge their town for resources, weapons, and clues to turn the tide and reverse the effects of the invading creatures from the OTHERSIDE.

KEY FEATURES:
EXPLORE. Scavenge for weapons, ammo, clues, and resources.
FIGHT. Combat a diverse set of creatures with unique styles with an arsenal of weapons.
CHOOSE. Play as four distinct hero types.
STRATEGY. Rescue civilians and flip game tiles to save your town.
REPLAY. Procedural game tiles create a unique town every play session.
